summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Ocean Super App Command Center Live Map feature. All core functionality working correctly including login, map display, filters, city selection, stats cards, and backend APIs.

ui_bugs.issue: Some markers are positioned outside viewport making them unclickable
ui_bugs.details: Markers appear to be rendered outside the visible map area after city changes, causing click timeouts

passed_tests: Command Center login with admin@ocean.com / admin123
Live Map page loads at /command/live-map with Arabic interface
Map displays with CARTO dark tiles
Stats cards show correct counts (10 drivers, 7 captains, 15 orders, 0 rides)
All filter buttons work (الكل, السائقين, الكباتن, الطلبات, المطاعم, الفنادق, الخدمات)
City selection buttons change map center (الرياض, جدة, مكة)
Backend API /api/command/live-map returns proper data structure
Live indicator shows connection status (green = connected)
Stats cards are clickable and filter data
All backend APIs return 200 status codes
Map markers display with different colors for different entity types
Filter functionality changes marker visibility correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor issue: Some map markers are positioned outside viewport after city changes, making them unclickable. Consider adjusting marker positioning logic or map bounds after city selection.
